<title level="1" pfs="">[Skeletal Woolly Rhinoceros](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1782)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Skeletal Woolly Rhinoceros](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1782)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 36</row>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +1

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 75
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 5, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 5, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 5, piercing 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
? horn +15 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+5 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
? foot +15,
**Damage** 2d6+6 bludgeoning

**Rhinoceros Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The rhino Strides twice, then makes a horn Strike. As long as the rhino moved at least 20 feet, the Strike's damage increases to 3d12+5. A Medium or smaller creature struck by this attack must succeed at a DC 22 Reflex save or be automatically [Shoved](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) back 5 feet and knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) by the force of the blow.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Medium or smaller, foot, DC 19

</column>
name: Skeletal Woolly Rhinoceros

text: Skeletal Woolly Rhinoceros Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 22 Unspecific Lore : DC 20 Specific Lore : DC 17 Skeletal Woolly Rhinoceros Source Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley pg. 36 Perception +9; darkvision Languages Skills Athletics +14 Str +5 Dex +1 Con +4 Int -5 Wis +2 Cha +0 --- AC 22 Fort +15 Ref +8 Will +11 HP 75 (negative healing) Immunities death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious Resistances cold 5, electricity 5, fire 5, piercing 5, slashing 5 --- Speed 35 feet Melee Single Action ? horn +15 (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d10+5 piercing Melee Single Action ? foot +15, Damage 2d6+6 bludgeoning Rhinoceros Charge Two Actions The rhino Strides twice, then makes a horn Strike. As long as the rhino moved at least 20 feet, the Strike's damage increases to 3d12+5. A Medium or smaller creature struck by this attack must succeed at a DC 22 Reflex save or be automatically Shoved back 5 feet and knocked prone by the force of the blow. Trample Three Actions Medium or smaller, foot, DC 19
